name: Sam Plast
description: supplying of an impeccable range of PVC
overview:
Established in the year 2012, we, ‘Sam Plast And Strips’, are an illustrious organization involved in the business of importing and supplying of an unbeatable range of PVC Curtains, PVC Strip Curtains and Industrial Strip Curtains. The products offered by us are manufactures using best quality raw material and advanced technology at our vendors end. The entire range of products are widely appreciated for their features like easy installation, high performance, durable finish and excellent reliability.

Our Products: Plastic Strip Curtains PVC Strip Door Curtains Flexible PVC Curtains PVC Strips

Application Areas: We are the most renowned and trustworthy firm that is fulfilling the needs of our valuable clients by offering them qualitative PVC Curtains, PVC Strip Curtains and Industrial Strip Curtains, which are available in variety of sizes, designs and patterns so as to meet the demands and expectations of large number of clients.

Our Team:
A team of diligent, skilled and dexterous professionals is the main strength of any organization. These professionals are appointed through strict procedures on the basis of their skills and qualifications. All our experts and professionals work in synchronization with one another and keep in touch with the clients’ in order to understand their choice and requirements.

Vendor Base: We are considered as one of the most reliable organization who are completely involved in offering a wide assortment of PVC Curtains, PVC Strip Curtains and Industrial Strip Curtains to our clients.
